spritesheet_description: Defines and displays sprite sheets from uploaded files.
ss_unknown_error: There was an unknown error processing the API request.
ss_api_must_be_posted: That API call must be done as a POST request.
ss_api_bad_title: Could not load Sprite Sheet from the page Title.
ss_api_fatal_error_loading: There was a fatal error attempting to load the Sprite Sheet or Title from the database.
ss_api_fatal_error_saving: There was a fatal error attempting to save the Sprite Sheet to the database.  The transaction has been rolled backed.
ss_api_invalid_coordinates: Invalid or out of bounds coordinates.
ss_api_invalid_percentages: Invalid or out of bounds percentages.
click_grid_for_preview: Click a grid box below to generate a sprite tag or click and drag to generate a custom slice.
no_sprite_sheet_defined: There is no sprite sheet defined for the specified image.  Please visit [[:$1]] to define one.
could_not_find_title: Could not find the image [[:$1]] to load a sprite sheet.
please_enter_sprite_name: Please enter a name for this custom sprite.
please_select_sprite: Please select a sprite or create a custom slice first.
